dcterms:description: A dataset containing citation data for scholarly papers published by the American Physical Society, covering the years 1893 to 2016, with a total of 595,287 papers and 7,051,801 citations.
dcterms:title: American Physical Society citation data (APS)

dcterms:description: A citation network dataset from the High-Energy Physics Literature Database INSPIRE, covering papers from 1764 to 2017, containing 829,708 papers and 14,994,123 citations.
dcterms:title: High-Energy Physics citation network (HEP)

dcterms:creator: L. Kogan
D. Papanikolaou
A. Seru
N. Stoffman
dcterms:description: A dataset of US patent citations covering the years 1926 to 2010, containing 6,237,625 patents and 45,962,301 citations, used to analyze significant patents.
dcterms:title: US patent citation network (PAT)
